Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

As you progress in the 40-day mandala since your initiation in the Shambhavi Mahamudra kriya, we thought of sharing this video where Sadhguru explores the need for maintaining the kriya and what it can do for you.

Our Youtube channels are an interesting library of Sadhguru's videos which are updated regularly. He gives practical answers to questions on life, yoga, relationships and various other aspects.

SUBSCRIBE to Sadhguru's channel
SUBSCRIBE to Isha Foundation's channel
Download 'Sadhguru' mobile application 

If you have any questions about your kriya, please write to
kriyasupport-apac@ishafoundation.org

We would also like to invite you to our Monthly Group Meditation sessions on second Saturdays of the month. Sadhguru's voice will guide us through the Shambhavi Mahamudra kriya in this session. It is also an opportunity to make your kriya more potent and acts as a great support to your practice.

With joy,
Isha Hong Kong Volunteers
hongkong@ishafoundation.org
